subject: pro x ultra pedals
description_text:
pedal controls says in  upgrade mode   please reset the button and
reconect the usb ??? i have done everything and still not connecting !

conversations.body_text: Hi cray jennings,    Please uninstall the old version of the software from your computer, then download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 using the link below. After that, follow the steps below to enter the firmware update process:    Press the upgrade button on the controller box;    Reconnect the USB cable;    Wait for the software to indicate it has entered “Simsonn Flasher Mode”;    Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu to start the firmware update;    Once the update is completed, release the upgrade button;    Finally, test and calibrate the pedals.
